EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_VMworld_2015.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Register now for your complimentary one-day pass @ VMworld
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<https://www.vmworld.com/registration.jspa?SponsorCode=VMWPTDEVD&src=Email_DevOps_Emailblast_VMworld15_Pivotal_US&cid=70180000000NtEE> VMworld 2015 is just around the corner, and Pivotal will be there, talking to customers and partners, chatting about topics like Cloud Native applications and DevOps.
Register now <https://www.vmworld.com/registration.jspa?SponsorCode=VMWPTDEVD&src=Email_DevOps_Emailblast_VMworld15_Pivotal_US&cid=70180000000NtEE> for your complimentary one-day pass for Developer Day @ VMworld on Wednesday, September 2. In conjunction with the DevOps @ VMworld Program, this all day event will include a live hackathon, Oâ€™Reilly Author Matt Stine and technology sessions for developers. This event will be free of charge ($900 value) and grant access to all the Wednesday content areas of VMworld, including Developer Day.
Register now <https://www.vmworld.com/registration.jspa?SponsorCode=VMWPTDEVD&src=Email_DevOps_Emailblast_VMworld15_Pivotal_US&cid=70180000000NtEE> for this exclusive day and start building your agenda today.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
